AMAZING the outcry of """"fear based"""" comments to this article. But Lets simplify from a guy who got really wise to his own health: The animal is raised in a stressful or non-stressful environment that is not his natural environment, killed under stress, processed and packaged for """"human consumption"""", it's still dead but now it has a shelf life in your fridge or freezer, you then thaw, season, and cook in a skillet that is known to be linked to cancer, the dead carcus then sits in your system for days on out, before you start the process over again for the next 7 days and the rest of your life. Your system starts to shut down slowly...and painfully...and you ask the doc ...how did this happen?? LOL!!...that's funny...and if you're not listening to your own body...I'm sorry to say that you caused your own death. Plain & simple. There's sooo many options to get what your body needs...start listening.
